string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_title
string.description: Title for the screen that showcases demonstrative usages of the Floating Toolbar widget [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_description
string.description: Body text describing the Floating Toolbar component within the design system [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

resources.string: The floating toolbar floats above the body content and can be used to display contextual actions relevant to the body content or the specific page.

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_orientation
string.description: Title for the toggle button group that determines the orientation for the Floating Toolbar [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_orientation_bottom
string.description: Text for a button that sets the Floating Toolbar to bottom orientation [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_orientation_left
string.description: Text for a button that sets the Floating Toolbar to left orientation [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_orientation_right
string.description: Text for a button that sets the Floating Toolbar to right orientation [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_bold_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that bolds the body text [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_italic_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that italicizes the body text [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_underlined_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that underlines the body text [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_color_text_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that sets the body text to a new random color [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_color_fill_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that sets the body text background to a new random color [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_strikethrough_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that strikes through the body text [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_left_align_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that left aligns the body text [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_center_align_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that center aligns the body text [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]

string.name: cat_floating_toolbar_button_right_align_content_description
string.description: Content description for a button that right aligns the body text [CHAR LIMIT=NONE]
